lead_paragraph: Investors are betting that a surge in international students will increase the imbalance in the supply and demand in student housing.

headline.print_headline: London Real Estate Sizzles Off Campus
headline.main: London Real Estate Sizzles Off Campus

snippet: Investors are betting that a surge in international students will increase the imbalance in the supply and demand in student housing.
abstract: Real Estate giants, private equity players and pension funds are making huge investments in east London, hoping to reap profits from student housing shortage as international students pour into city; world's growing middle and upper classes have flocked to city for higher education; some 3.5 billion pounds of student housing real estate deals have been conducted in London in 2015 alone.
